insert into interviewer_career (career_no, interviewer_info_no, company_name, career_term, career_start_time, career_end_time) select seq_interviewer_career_no.nextval, a.* from (
select #{interviewerInfoNo} as interviewer_info_no, #{career.companyName} as company_name, to_number(#{career.careerTerm}) as career_term, to_date(#{career.careerStartTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as career_start_time, to_date(#{career.careerEndTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as career_end_time from dual ) a

insert into interviewer_certificate (certificate_no, interviewer_info_no, certificate_name, certificate_issuer, certificate_date) select seq_interviewer_certificate_no.nextval, a.* from (
select #{interviewerInfoNo} as interviewer_info_no, #{certificate.certificateName} as certificate_name, #{certificate.certificateIssuer} as certificate_issuer, to_date(#{certificate.certificateDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as certificate_date from dual ) a
